lead_paragraph: A personal rule is not to pick against the New England Patriots until Coach Bill Belichick and quarterback Tom Brady are firmly in retirement. You never look stupid picking New England, winner of three of the past five Super Bowls.
snippet: A personal rule is not to pick against the New England Patriots until Coach Bill Belichick and quarterback Tom Brady are firmly in retirement. You never look stupid picking New England, winner of three of the past five Super Bowls.
